Name: 虚空灵药园
About the game: He mistakenly entered the secret realm of the void with abundant aura, met the seriously injured female master, and then embarked on the life of cultivating pills... Game content 1. A variety of herbs can be planted. 2. Cutting trees, mining rocks, collecting resources and doing tasks. 3. The monster was full of treasure, and took him to make pills to save the master. 4. Refine knives, swords, axes and sledgehammers. 5. Create your own void medicine garden and be an elegant migrant worker.
